==== Create a new Source Page ====
* Go to [[Sources.WebHome]] and click "Create" * Choose the PSource Template * Make up a name for the tactic * Click "Create" * You should now be looking at your new page. Dont worry that it doesnt look right yet.
==== Add Objects to your page ====
* You are now going to add a single PSourceClass object to your page: * Under the Edit menu, choose "Objects".
===== Add a "PSource Class" object =====
* In the "new object:" field, choose "PSource Class" and click "Add". * Now fill in the fields with information about the source: ** name: the same as the title ** description: a bland, generic description (e.g. "a right-leaning news channel") ** iconURL: the URL to an icon image for the source. typically gotten from a wikipedia page by right-clicking on an image and choosing "Copy Image Location" and then pasting. ** wikipediaURL: the URL for the source's wikipedia page. ** sourceType: the type of media. * Press "Save". Open this page in another tab to view it, so you don't have to keep going in and out of "edit mode". Every time you press "Save", go to the other tab and refresh the page. * At this point, verify that the full page looks correct.
